premise_source_doc_sentence: He was educated at the University of Manitoba and the University of Cambridge ; he began his teaching career as a Professor of English at several universities in the U.S. and Canada before moving to the University of Toronto , where he remained for the rest of his life .

claim: Marshall McLuhan was heavily involved in media discourse.
